meanings.definition: Relating to or situated across the chest.
meanings.sent1: The transthoracically placed stethoscope helped the doctor listen to the heart.
meanings.sent2: The transthoracically positioned X-ray revealed a fracture in the rib cage.
meanings.sent3: The transthoracically painted mural of lungs on the wall added a unique touch to the clinic.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a transthoracically strong heartbeat, always present and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The image of the transthoracically placed pacemaker stayed in his mind, a symbol of life and hope.
